name: Floating Island
description: A mysterious floating island defies gravity and creates a unique strategic position, but the unstable nature makes it dangerous to inhabit. The island may contain rare resources or magical properties, while the ability to move or drift creates unpredictable access.
atmosphere: Mysterious landmass that defies gravity in sky. Thin air carries earth, vegetation, and rare resources scent. Unstable nature makes it dangerous to inhabit. Ability to move or drift creates unpredictable access. May contain rare resources or magical properties. Floating nature creates wonder and otherworldly beauty.
